name: SKYPEACE
description:
SKYPEACE is a high-speed action
game where you clear stages by
carefully avoiding the enemies that
appear.

Feel the excitement of using simple
manoeuvres to get tons of coins!

Collect coins consecutively to trigger
a combo, and string together combos
to get a hi-score.

Also enjoy challenges by earning
achievements through a variety of
conditions!

Enjoy exhilarating, high-speed action,
unfolding in the air!
